page.title: 12VIDEO MEDIA
page.content: Half of the children in my class have a video recorder.A video is a machine that records televison programmes and films.You can hire out video films from a video shop.The average length of a video film is three hours.Some of the boys choose BREAK DANCE videos.The most popular video is "ROCKY 3"it is about a boxer who wants to be a world champion."BEAT STREET" is about a crew of street dancers who audition for a dance film."HERBIE IN THE LOVE BUG" is about a car that can drive itself and do tricks There are two types of video recorders (VHS & BETAMAX).Most people have VHS recorders but the quality is better on BETAMAX.The most popular VHS make is PHILLIPS.The most popular BETAMAX make is TOSHIBA.
